briefTitle: A Study of LY900014 and Insulin Lispro With an External Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion System in Adult Participants With Type 1 Diabetes
officialTitle: A Prospective, Randomized, Double-Blind, Crossover Comparison Evaluating Compatibility and Safety of LY900014 and Insulin Lispro With an External Continuous Subcutaneous Insulin Infusion System in Adult Patients With Type 1 Diabetes (PRONTO-Pump)
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the compatibility and safety of LY900014 and insulin lispro with an external continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion system in adult participants with type 1 diabetes.
